globalStyles.headDescription: Global styles, design tokens, and CSS variables for consistent design across the entire template
globalStyles.pageDescription: Design system, CSS variables, and global styles that ensure consistency across all components

colorPalette.title: Color Palette
colorPalette.description: Primary colors used throughout the template

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Complete typography system using Inter font with fallbacks, including all heading levels, body text, and weight variations
typography.bodyText: Body text - Regular paragraph text used throughout the template for readability and consistency.
typography.smallText: Small text - Used for captions, labels, and secondary information.
typography.mediumWeight: Medium weight text - Used for emphasis and important information.
typography.semiBold: Semi-bold text - Used for strong emphasis and call-to-action elements.
typography.bold: Bold text - Used for maximum emphasis and important headings.
typography.captionText: Caption text - Used for very small text like footnotes and metadata.
typography.interFont: Inter Font Family - Modern, highly legible typeface designed for user interfaces.
typography.fontSans: Font Sans - System font stack with Inter as primary, includes fallbacks for maximum compatibility.

spacingSystem.title: Spacing System
spacingSystem.description: Consistent spacing variables used across components

borderRadius.title: Border radius
borderRadius.description: Consistent border radius values for rounded corners across all components

components.title: Components
components.usingComponentsText: Import and use components in your Astro pages:

availableList.headers: Headers: Multiple variations (center, left, right, mega, login)
availableList.heroes: Heroes: Simple, split, bento, carousel, background
availableList.faq: FAQ: List, minimal, and side layouts
availableList.footers: Footers: Grid, CTA, and newsletter variations

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.staticHostingText: This template generates static files perfect for:

list.vercel: Vercel: Connect your GitHub repo for automatic deployments
list.netlify: Netlify: Drag and drop the dist folder
list.ghpages: GitHub Pages: Use GitHub Actions for automated builds
list.any: Any static host: Upload the dist folder contents

deployment.buildOutputText: After running npm run build, your static site will be in the dist folder.
deployment.envText: No environment variables required for basic usage. The template works out of the box.

customization.title: Customization
customization.contentText: Update content by editing the component files directly. All text and images can be customized in their respective components.
customization.imagesText: Replace placeholder images in the directory
customization.navigationText: Update navigation links in the header components. The mega menu structure can be modified in Header.astro files.

homeHero.title: Code less, build faster.
homeHero.description: A clean component kit for developers who want speed and good taste.

card.title: Premium Components
card.description: Access to our complete library of clean, responsive components with lifetime updates

q1.question: What is Starter UI?
q1.answer: It’s a minimal Astro template with ready-to-use sections (Hero, Pricing, FAQ, etc.), clean CSS tokens, and an MDX-powered blog.

q2.question: Does it support multiple languages?
q2.answer: Yes. The site uses folder-based i18n (EN/ES) and static JSON dictionaries for UI strings. Blog posts use frontmatter translations.

q3.question: Can I write posts in MDX?
q3.answer: Absolutely. Content Collections with MDX let you write rich posts and embed components, validated by a Zod schema.

q4.question: How do I customize the design?
q4.answer: Use the CSS tokens in src/styles/tokens.css for colors, spacing, shadows, and transitions. Sections have isolated CSS.

video1.title: Build a landing in minutes.
video1.description: See how Starter UI lets you spin up a clean landing page in less than 5 minutes. No fluff, just production-ready components you can drop and ship.

video2.title: Change one token, change it all.
video2.description: Update your brand colors once and watch the entire design adapt instantly. Starter UI is built on simple global tokens — no messy overrides.

video3.title: From idea to shipped component.
video3.description: Starter UI gives you clean, reusable components you can trust. Focus on your app, not reinventing buttons or layouts.

footer.description: Starter UI — professional and modern component kit.
